mapper.select: select goodsnum, price, name, rnum, img, inputdate from (select goodsnum, name, price, img, goodsinputdate inputdate, row_number() over(order by dibsinputdate desc) rnum from v_dibs_list where mem_num='${memnum}') where rnum between 1 and 4

select goodsnum, price, name, rnum, img, inputdate from (select GOODS_NUM goodsnum, name, price, img, inputdate, row_number() over(order by sell_date desc) rnum from V_SOLD_LIST where MEM_NUM_Sell='${memnum}') where rnum between 1 and 4

select goodsnum, price, name, rnum, img, inputdate from (select MEM_NUM_BUY, GOODS_NUM goodsnum, NAME, PRICE, IMG, SELL_DATE, INPUTDATE, row_number() over(order by sell_date desc) rnum from v_bought_list where MEM_NUM_BUY='${memnum}') where rnum between 1 and 4
